<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->

# Retry Node Formatting

Represents `retry` keyword

<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Formats

Before:

```ruby
def update
  find.save
rescue NotUnique
  retry
end
```

After:

```ruby
def update
  find.save
rescue NotUnique
  retry
end
```

## Formats with a guard

Before:

```ruby
def update
  find.save
rescue NotUnique
  retry if safe
end
```

After:

```ruby
def update
  find.save
rescue NotUnique
  retry if safe
end
```
